state: Hey, thanks for coming over to the TextWorld today, there is something I need you to do for me. First thing I need you to do is to take a trip west. Then, go to the south. Once you manage that, attempt to head south. Then, make an effort to take a trip west. Once you do that, go south. Then, make an effort to venture east. After that, head north. And then, make an attempt to head north. If you can succeed at that, go to the north. And then, attempt to head west. Then, go south. Next, move south. With that over with, go east. After that, go to the north. After that, retrieve the coin from the floor of the steam room. Got that? Good! -= Garage =- You've just shown up in a garage. You decide to start listing off everything you see in the room, as if you were in a text adventure. There is an unblocked exit to the west. > -= Garage =-0/1
